title: Planet ocean
brief_description: Tamara Rewse, a self confessed avid stamp collector explores the unknown depths of the ocean, coming across creatures such as sharks, dolphins and manta rays, which co-incidentally can also be found in Australia Post’s Planet Ocean series of stamps. Includes discussion with the stamp’s designer.
